data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Reserve with Google Integration. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

requestBody.title: Owner reviews consolidated calendar state API Trace

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

requestBody.title: Owner creates business tenant API Trace

data.title: Owner creates business tenant API Trace
